item.description:
I have been invited to this fundraiser by one of the organizers, someone who I trust to put together a positive event with some great bands .  I am extending the invitation to all of you to join me in the afternoon..However, I am also using it as an excuse to go to one of my favorite sushi places, Kumo.  Kumo is half price on Sundays and is conveniently located to Cafe Nine. 

I will be at Cafe Nine (250 STATE STREET, NEW HAVEN, CT 06511 203-789-8281) around 3 p.m.  Then I will head over to Kumo at 5:30. 

NOTE THE DIFFERENT START TIME for dinner 5:30 instead of 6 p.m.

Music Event -

Taken from the Cafe Nine schedule on their website:

http://cafenine.com/schedule.html 

----------------

May 22,
Sunday
1 - 5 pm SPECIAL FUNDRAISER FOR SPECIAL NEEDS • John Thomas; James Velvet And The Lonesome Sparrows; The Katarina Beaudreaux Band; The Furors; Age Of Reason; the Coalition • bands are donating their time and talents to help raise funds for the residents of Opportunity House in Hamden $5 - 10
suggested donation

 Here is more info about the Opportunity House (from the Hamden Journal):

http://www.thehamdenjournal.com/index.php/archive/viewer/hamden_journal_to_partner_with_opportunity_house_for_home_delivery

And here is the KUMO website:

http://www.kumohibachisteakhouse.com/ordereze/default.aspx
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at Cafe Nine by 3 p.m. and will then be moving on to Kumo at 5:30 p.m.
item.why: Half price sushi night at Kumo...and a chance to hear LIVE music in support of adults with autism at the Opportunity House in Hamden

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: New Haven Fun Sunday!
